p: Nucleic acid from samples submitted to VIDRL was extracted using the Qiagen Qiamp 96 kit and a Qiacube HD extraction robot as per the manufacturer’s instructions (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany). RNA was reverse transcribed using Bioline’s Sensifast synthesis kit (Bioline, UK) as per kit instructions. Nucleic acid from samples collected at CHW was extracted using the Qiagen Viral RNA mini kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) and RNA was reverse transcribed using Life Technologies’ Superscript IV VILO master mix kit (Thermofisher Scientific, Victoria, Australia) as per manufacturers’ instructions. cDNA was stored at −20 °C until processing.
